General.Name: Zhejiang Hailiang Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhe Jiang Hai Liang Co., Ltd engages in the production, sale, and service of copper products, materials of conductors, and aluminum-based materials. Its products include copper coil tubes, straight tubes, fittings, copper and brass bars, copper bus bars, aluminum tubes, denitration catalysts, and other equipment. The company's products are used in household appliance, equipment and instrument, ship, electricity, new energy vehicles, energy storage, photovoltaic, wind energy, semiconductor, 5G communication, and others. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Zhuji, China.
